'''"Comfort of a Home Away From Home"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Comfort of a Home Away From Home" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]], in an underground room. This room is unlocked during the {{Quest|Fontaine Research Institute, Stagnating in the Rubble}}.
